Package org.seedstack.seed.core.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Application
    This class specifies an interface to the application global object which consists of: The identity of the application (human readable name, unique identifier and instance identifier), The application storage location, The list of available environments, The name of the current detected environment, The current status of debug mode (enabled or disabled).
    CommandRegistry
    The command registry holds all command definitions and can be used to retrieve additional information on them.
    DataManager
    The data manager provides data import and export facilities.
    DiagnosticManager
    The diagnostic manager enables to access diagnostic information or write it somewhere.
    ErrorCode
    Common interface for error codes enumerations.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Configuration.ConfigurationErrorCode
    Provides the default configuration error code.
    CoreErrorCode
    SEED core error codes.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SeedException
    This is the base class for all technical SEED exceptions.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Configuration
    This annotation marks fields which will be automatically valued by SEED, using application configuration.
    FromContext
    This can be used to specify a named JNDI context when applied on a @Resource annotated field.
    Ignore
    This annotation marks ignorable elements.
    Install
    This annotation marks modules that will be automatically installed by SEED.
    Logging
    This annotation marks loggers which will be automatically injected by the SEED core plugin.
